titleInfo.title: Development and Plasticity of the Tectofugal Visual Pathway in the Zebra Finch
The changing visual system: maturation and aging in the central nervous system

bibliographicCitation.frontiers: Bischof, H. - J., Herrmann, K., and Engelage, J. (1991). “Development and Plasticity of the Tectofugal Visual Pathway in the Zebra Finch” in The changing visual system: maturation and aging in the central nervous system, Bagnoli, P. ed. NATO ASI Series : Series A, vol. 222, (New York: Plenum), 199-208.
